sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SABLESTAN, or Sablustan, a province of Aſia, in Persia, on the frontiers of Indoſtan; bounded on the north by Khoraſan; on the eaſt, by the mountains of Balk and Candahar; on the ſouth, by Sageſtan or Segeſtan; and on the weft, by Heri. It is a mountainous country, very little known to Europeans; nor is it certain which is the capital town.
